H0.text: Coxa is the medical name for which joint of the human body. Shoulder

H1.text: Coxa is the medical name for which joint of the human body. Elbow

H2.text: Coxa is the medical name for which joint of the human body. Wrist

H3.text: Coxa is the medical name for which joint of the human body. HIP

A4.text: the hip, or coxa (pl. : coxae) in medical terminology, refers to either an anatomical region or a joint on the outer (lateral) side of the pelvis

A5.text: The hip joint or coxofemoral joint is a ball and socket synovial joint formed by the articulation of the rounded head of the femur and the cup-like acetabulum of the pelvis
